messages.description: It may be possible for the net [Process] to complete without any generated work. Check the empty tasks linking from i to o.
id-15 the postset of any OR/XOR split must have exactly one default flow (not 0)
id-13 the postset of any OR/XOR split must have exactly one default flow (not 0)
id-13 any flow from any XOR/OR-split [id-13] must have either a predicate or be a default flow.
AtomicTask:Node1 any flow from any AND-split [AtomicTask:Node1] may not have an xpath predicate.
id-15 any flow from any XOR/OR-split [id-15] must have either a predicate or be a default flow.
